lyric: 作词 : 尹纯青Eyn
作曲 : 蔡近翰Zoe(HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)/Luna Safari
The way I go through with red roses burn my eyes.
translation: 道途之上，赤玫瑰灼烧我的双目

lyric: Cold rain starts pouring hard, I'm being called upon.
translation: 冷雨如注，我于此只为一声召唤

lyric: Never let you go, it's why I did them all.
translation: 绝不放弃你，是我做这一切的原因

lyric: For a chance at least, to live in your way.
translation: 至少这一次，以自己的方式活吧

lyric: Love of you is my most cherished thing.
translation: 予你的爱是我最珍惜的事物

lyric: So stay alive, bravely.
I wish I could wake from the dream each time I dream.
translation: 我希望从夙夜梦寐中苏醒

lyric: There's a long night coming soon，I'd shine as the last shine.
translation: 很快长夜将至，我愿化作最后的光芒

lyric: Never let you go，it's why I did them all.
translation: 绝不放弃你，是我做这一切的原因

lyric: For a chance at least, to live in your way.
translation: 至少这一次，以自己的方式活吧

lyric: Love of you is my most cherished thing.
translation: 予你的爱是我最珍惜的事物

lyric: So stay alive, bravely.
Never let you go，it's why I did them all.
translation: 绝不放弃你，是我做这一切的原因

lyric: For a chance at least, to live in your way.
translation: 至少这一次，以自己的方式活吧

lyric: Love of you is my most cherished thing.
translation: 予你的爱是我最珍惜的事物

lyric: So stay alive, bravely.
